__e: "My help cometh from the Lord who made heaven and Earth.
We, Father God, also realize... that you are the creator of earth and heaven... moon and the stars.
God is the Creator of Heaven and Earth and of all things.
God is the Creator of Heaven and Earth and of all things.
We, Father God, also realize... that you are the creator of earth and heaven... moon and the stars.

And no matter what's going on... no matter how big the mountain is, how dark the night, how distant you might seem from our God, the truth is tonight, the Creator of the universe, the Author of life, the God of Heaven, He is here,
Let me guess, he claimed he owned the concept.
The power, honor and worshipfulness are Yours, and of the Father and of the Holy Ghost, for now and forever and ever.
The fire-raiser watches the mountains, but his fire is dying.
And I shall be so proud, to think that I'm the maker of such a man.
And I've put God, the creator of everything, on the right side.
It was the only time in my life that I stood before the Creator and felt like a complete human being.
God is a perfect Being, Creator and Lord of Heaven and Earth
What I have done and not done is between me and my maker and there's an end on it.
My father used to say when a man meets his maker face to face and has to account for his time on this great green Earth of ours, what does he stand for that actually matters?
